title: ACS Welcomes Sentencing Council’s New Guidelines for Shop Theft Offences (ACS - Association of Convenience ...
text: ( Source : ACS - Association of Convenience Stores ) ACS has welcomed the Sentencing Council 's new sentencing guidelines for shop theft which emphasise the emotional distress, property damage and the effect on the business when sanctioning
